fullplot: Away from home, living alone in an old and gloomy apartment, Pèrola feels the effects of the time passing, being increasingly taken by nostalgia and fear to a point where dream, fantasy and reality lose its borders.
plot: Away from home, living alone in an old and gloomy apartment, Pèrola feels the effects of the time passing, being increasingly taken by nostalgia and fear to a point where dream, fantasy and reality lose its borders.
title: The Mysterious Death of Pèrola
